mapper.insert: insert into review_report( review_report_id, review_report_member_id, review_report_review_id, review_report_type, review_report_content ) values( seq_review_report.nextval, #{reviewReportMemberId}, #{reviewReportReviewId}, #{reviewReportType}, #{reviewReportContent} )
mapper.select: select * from review_report_list order by review_report_date desc
select review_report_type, count(*) as count from review_report where review_report_review_id = #{reviewReportReviewId} group by review_report_type
